title: Dusit Fudu signs a new resort in Panzhihua City, Sichuan Province , China
text:
Dusit Fudu signs a new resort in Panzhihua City, Sichuan Province , China Adv: 
Jul 21, 2015 Adv: 
Dusit Fudu Hotels and Resorts is pleased to announce the signing of a second management agreement with Panzhihua Pulongda Real Estate Development Co. Ltd. to manage a 150-room Dusit Princess Resort in Panzhihua City, Sichuan Province. This will be the city’s first international resort and will open in late 2016. 
Panzhihua City, south of Sichuan Province and adjacent to Yunnan, is an ideal leisure destination especially during winter as the city is blessed with abundant sunshine almost every day. The daily average temperature during winter is approximately 15ºC. 
The Dusit Princess Resort Panzhihua, Sichuan, is conveniently situated within the city’s eco-tourism zone, currently being developed into a new lifestyle destination in West China. Located within close proximity to the recently announced Dusit Thani Panzhihua, the resort enjoys easy accessibility, being strategically positioned opposite the high speed train station. It is also only 10 minutes by car from the central business district and Bao’anying Airport. 
The 150-room international mid-scale resort includes 112 well-appointed rooms with beautiful outdoor gardens. The resort also offers an all-day dining restaurant, lobby lounge and 3 function rooms. For recreation, guests can choose from a range of facilities including a gymnasium, dance studio, kids’ club and activity room. A medical centre within the resort also offers therapeutic Traditional Chinese Medicine services. 
The resort is located within a sprawling complex which comprises the Dusit Thani Panzhihua Resort, hot springs facilities, sports venues, a golf course, luxury residential blocks, a hospital, school and theme park. The theme park is inspired by mango orchards and will make a perfect escape for families, offering an amusement garden, kids’ playground, BBQ facilities, a water park, a brewery and shops. 
“We welcome the Dusit Princess Resort Panzhihua, Sichuan to our growing portfolio of Dusit Princess Hotels and Resorts around the world. The Dusit Princess Resort Panzhihua is an efficient, comfortable and affordable resort with the well-being of travellers in mind,” said Mr. Lim Boon Kwee, President of Dusit Fudu Hotels and Resorts. 
Mr. Deng Mian Ming, General Manager of Panzhihua Pulongda Real Estate Development Co. Ltd., expressed his confidence in the management and hospitality expertise of Dusit Fudu Hotels and Resorts. “We are delighted to grow our collaboration with Dusit Fudu Hotels and Resorts. The Dusit Princess Panzhihua, Sichuan is designed to appeal to travellers who seek an optimal combination of a great location with functional rooms, and gracious service,” he concluded.
